notes.title: Update
notes.text:
- New feature: Syndicate rewards matrix overlay (see in taskbar) + hotkey (settings -> taskbar). Thanks @Etuldan for contributing.
- Added support for buying bulk maps from one seller in poeapp.com
- Fix notification panel layout when buying/selling maps from poe trade/poeapp
- Added some new icons for currencies.

Happy holidays! Don't forget to support the app. Thanks!
